explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing a red headscarf and pink clothes sits excitedly at a wooden table with several boxes of Cadbury chocolates. He holds a glass of milk in his other hand, ready to conduct a chocolate milk-dipping test. The background features a white wall decorated with picture frames.

[0-4] The scene switches to the hands of the man in pink. He holds a chocolate-coated wafer biscuit, preparing to dip it into the milk. The text "Easy" appears. Next, the man's hands hold a Cadbury chocolate chip cookie and dip it into the milk. The text "Hard" appears. As he tries to take the cookie out, it breaks and falls into the milk.

[4-8] The scene then switches again. The man in pink holds a honeycomb chocolate bar and dips it into the milk. The text "Impossible" appears. It also breaks. He then takes a round chocolate biscuit, preparing to dip it into the milk. The text "Mythic" appears. The man takes the round chocolate biscuit out, leaving only the red candy center.
